sentence.text: Further, apoptotic process heterozygous for either nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process, nonsense-mediated decay or mRNA splicing, via spliceosome exhibit aberrant neurogenesis and microcephaly.

entity.text: nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process, nonsense-mediated decay

sentence.text: Using a new conditional allele, we first show that mRNA splicing, via spliceosome haploinsufficiency phenocopies aberrant neurogenesis and microcephaly of nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process, nonsense-mediated decay and mRNA splicing, via spliceosome mutant apoptotic process.

entity.text: nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process, nonsense-mediated decay
